DOC.brief_summary: This study design compare range dos GW856553 versus placebo biomarkers associate rheumatoid arthritis
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose Study Of GW856553 On A Protein That Is An Indicator For Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Must diagnosis RA accord revised 1987 criterion American College Rheumatology . Must 3 swell 3 tender/painful joint screen . Must stable weekly methotrexate ( 2.5mg25mg ) least eight week prior screen . Exclusion criterion : Must morbidly obese .
